name: Popular Day Hikes: Canadian Rockies - Revised
categories: Popular Day Hikes: Canadian Rockies - Revised
description: Explore one of Canada's most beautiful mountain environments. This guidebook covers 37 popular, accessible trails in the Canadian Rockies. It contains a blend of easy short-day walks, more strenuous full-day hikes, and the occasional easy scramble. Each hike includes round trip distances, difficulty ratings, seasonal information, colour maps and photographs, and detailed directions to trailheads. Revised second edition features a fresh design and the most current route updates.
